response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Given its importance, I am extending a special offer to you at a price of $950,000. This is a generous discount considering its true worth, which I estimate to be around $1,200,000. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
